alert.note: Alert for Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 30 at 3:28PM EDT until April 30 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Halifax County in central North Carolina... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Halifax, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Halifax County, including the following locations... Tillery. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
